issues.title: Climate Change and Environmental Protection
issues.description: Strong advocate for aggressive climate action, supports reducing carbon emissions and protecting New Mexico's natural resources

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding Medicaid coverage and protecting reproductive healthcare rights

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship, and protecting immigrant rights

issues.title: Economic Development
issues.description: Supports raising minimum wage, workforce development programs, and supporting small businesses

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, teacher pay raises, and expanded early childhood education

issues.title: Gun Safety
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive background checks and moderate gun control measures

issues.title: Clean Energy Transition
issues.description: Supports moving New Mexico towards renewable energy, especially solar and wind power
